snippet.title: NEW MERCH, Vacation, and Something we want to CONFIRM...
snippet.description:
We're about to head off for vacation! Before we go, we want to announce some new merch and a little thing coming in 1.0... 👀

⬇ Links and Info ⬇ 
Website + FAQ ‣ https://satisfactorygame.com 
NEW Community Wiki ‣ https://satisfactory.wiki.gg/  

⬇ Where to buy Satisfactory ⬇ 
Steam ‣ https://store.steampowered.com/app/526870/Satisfactory/  
Epic ‣ https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/satisfactory  
Humble Store ‣ https://www.humblebundle.com/store/satisfactory  

⬇ Merch Stores ⬇ 
Heroic Replicas ‣ https://lizarddoggo.com/ 

⬇ Report bugs and make suggestions ⬇ 
https://questions.satisfactorygame.com  

⬇ Social Media ⬇ 
Twitter ‣ https://twitter.com/SatisfactoryAF   
Facebook ‣ https://facebook.com/SatisfactoryGame  
Instagram ‣ https://instagram.com/coffee_stain_studios 
TikTok ‣ https://www.tiktok.com/@satisfactorygame
Discord ‣ https://discord.gg/satisfactory  
Reddit ‣ http://reddit.com/r/satisfactorygame  
Twitch ‣ https://twitch.tv/coffeestainstudiosdevs 

⬇ Community Managers ⬇ 
Snutt ‣ https://twitter.com/BustaSnutt 
Mikael 

⬇ Editor ⬇ 
Masonzero Gaming ► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZpSG3NJ5apF9fhdkd1goRQ 

0:00 Intro
1:48 New Merch
5:54 [redacted]

#Satisfactory is an FPS open-world factory building sim by #CoffeeStain Studios. You play as an engineer on an alien planet as part of the ‘Save The Day’ program - a program whose goal is to construct a massive machine for a mysterious purpose. Conquer nature, build multi-story factories, and automate to satisfaction!
